event.title: "Is Interoperability cool again? Entangling the DMA, FOSS and the Telecom Sector" - FSFE's programme manager Lucas Lasota at the Weizenbaum's Plamadiso Talk series (online)

body.p: On 27 March 2025, FSFE's Legal programme manager Lucas Lasota will participate in Weizenbaum's talk series Palmadiso (Platforms, Markets, and the Digital Society), organised by the research group "Digital Economy, Internet Ecosystem, and Internet Policy" at the Weizenbaum Institute for the Networked Society. The talk will explore FSFE's activities around the Digital Markets Act, interoperability and Free Software. The event will take place online. To register, follow the instructions on the linked page.
